title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1290.23 - Use of premises for lodging, sleeping or immoral purposes prohibited
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1290.23 - Use of premises for lodging, sleeping or immoral purposes prohibited

State Regulations

No occupant of space at the World Trade Center shall use
the same for lodgings or sleeping purposes or for any immoral
purposes. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1290.23

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
